sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import bucketIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/bucket.svg' import bronzeCoin from '../../../assets/pictures/coins/bronze/coin_front.svg' import goldenCoin from '../../../assets/pictures/coins/golden/coin_front.svg' import saltIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/salt.svg' import shovelIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/shovel.svg' import treeIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/tree.svg' import walletIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/wallet.svg' import Navigation from '../../ui/Navigation/Navigation' import axiosDB from '../../../utils/axios/axiosConfig' import { getId } from '../../../utils/config' import Loading from '../Loading/Loading' import './Coins.css' const Coins = () => { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const telegramId = getId() useEffect(() => { const fetchUserData = async () => { try { const response = await axiosDB.get(`/user/${telegramId}`) const user = response.data console.log(user) } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching user data:', error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } fetchUserData() }, [telegramId]) if (loading) { return } return (

pinocchio coin

{user.coins}{' '}

7

+

150

%

shovel

bucket

salt

) } export default Coins
